controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminController, AlbumHomeController, LoginController, PhotoDisplayController, PhotosController, SearchResultsController

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class mainly deals with loading the FXML and data and changing screens It is the parent to all controllers.
    Author:
    Sarah Squillace, Nikita Zala
